prompts: Create a normal-type Pokemon resembling a large rodent with a fluffy tail and prominent whiskers.
Show me a Pokemon that has a round body, short limbs, and a mischievous expression.
Design a Pokemon with a bold color palette featuring dark fur and cream accents.
Imagine a small creature with large ears and a knack for scurrying around urban environments.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a clever scavenger in a bustling city.
Make a fluffy rodent-like Pokemon that is always on the lookout for food.
Give me an adorable yet sneaky creature that blends into forested areas.
